title: Nikola Tesla - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/23/20
itunes:title: Nikola Tesla - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/23/20
description:
George Noory and author Marc Seifer explore his research into famous early 20th century inventor Nikola Tesla, how he was able to create things like a particle death ray and free energy devices, and his rivalries with Albert Einstein and Thomas Edison.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
